content: "Come on," he said. "We've got to get the place fixed! All the hot dogs boiling, the buns warm, the chili cooking, the onions peeled and diced, the relish laid out, the napkins in the dips, the place spotless! Hey!" He did a little wild dance, kicking his heels. "Oh boy, I'm happy; yes sir, I'm happy," he sang off key. "This is my lucky day!"
author: Ray Bradbury
